name: SokeriHumala
description:
SokeriHumala is a halloween-themed survival game where you have to collect candy and avoid enemies while keeping an eye on your candy count. If it drops to 0, you lose. Try to survive for as long as you can in this haunted forest of sweet nightmares!

Made by:

Music and level desing: Lukas Pietilä

Sprites: Elmo Malinen

AI and Scenes: Okko Ahonen

Programming and Cover: Aleksi Pirttinen
